name: Erleg Khan (Erlik)
shortLoreBlurb: Erleg Khan (Erlik) is a deity from Mongolic/Turkic linked to underworld king, death. They mediate funerary rites and karmic reckonings.
description: Erleg Khan (Erlik) is a deity from Mongolic/Turkic linked to underworld king, death. They mediate funerary rites and karmic reckonings.
